title: 1.147 STATE GEMSTONE.
text:
The Lake Superior agate is the official gemstone of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph and a typical specimen of the Lake Superior agate shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: official_gemstone
variables.description: The official gemstone of the state.

variables.name: preserved_photograph
variables.description: The photograph preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: preserved_specimen
variables.description: The specimen preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

consequences: The Lake Superior agate is confirmed as the official gemstone of Minnesota.
A photograph of the Lake Superior agate is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
A specimen of the Lake Superior agate is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
